iti44:2.3_0: Saupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu, anupādisesā ca nibbānadhātu.
iti44:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto.
iti44:3.3_0: Tassa tiṭṭhanteva pañcindriyāni yesaṁ avighātattā manāpāmanāpaṁ paccanubhoti, sukhadukkhaṁ paṭisaṁvedeti.
iti44:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu arahaṁ hoti khīṇāsavo vusitavā katakaraṇīyo ohitabhāro anuppattasadattho parikkhīṇabhavasaṁyojano sammadaññāvimutto.
iti44:4.3_0: Tassa idheva, bhikkhave, sabbavedayitāni anabhinanditāni sīti bhavissanti.
iti44:7.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
